This is the introduction of this application

Athlete Tracker Version 1.5.5

Athlete Tracker is an app which athlete can attach a phone to their body and via GPS, track the location of the athlete, the distance they have run, the number of sprints above certain thresholds

Application can show where player during the game, the run he made, the sprints he made and essential "map" the movement of the player during the game. Therefore, the player or coach can analyse where the player spent most of his time, where he produced sprints

Return to the previous screen by touching the Back button.
Hardware required to use this application

This app required device must have GPS service and Internet connection

For Athlete Tracker to correctly track your progress, you need to be outdoors. The accuracy of this app base on the accuracy of GPS device.

Return to the previous screen by touching the Back button.
Show you step-by-steps instruction to use this app

Enable GPS setting before starting application.

Click Setting icon to adjust the Threshold. There are 4 Thresholds you can adjust

Click Menu icon on Action bar to select various function of this app.

Click Start button on main screen to start tracking. Application will display the "heat map" of the player, the runs and the sprints which player has made

Click Pause button to pause tracking.

Click Stop button to stop tracking.

After finish the tracking, the player information could be shared on Facebook or upload to server.

Return to the previous screen by touching the Back button.
